typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		createdDateTime as string,
		lastModifiedDateTime as string,
		changeKey as string,
		categories as string[],
		receivedDateTime as string,
		sentDateTime as string,
		hasAttachments as boolean,
		internetMessageId as string,
		subject as string,
		bodyPreview as string,
		importance as string,
		parentFolderId as string,
		conversationId as string,
		conversationIndex as string,
		isDeliveryReceiptRequested as string,
		isReadReceiptRequested as boolean,
		isRead as boolean,
		isDraft as boolean,
		webLink as string,
		inferenceClassification as string,
		internetMessageHeaders as (name as string, value as string)[],
		body as (contentType as string, content as string),
		sender as (emailAddress as (name as string, address as string)),
		from as (emailAddress as (name as string, address as string)),
		toRecipients as (emailAddress as (name as string, address as string))[],
		ccRecipients as string[],
		bccRecipients as string[],
		replyTo as string[],
		uniqueBody as (contentType as string, content as string),
		flag as (flagStatus as string),
		attachments as (id as string, lastModifiedDateTime as string, name as string, contentType as string, size as string, isInline as boolean, contentId as string, contentLocation as string, contentBytes as string, ODataType as string)[],
		ODataType as string,
		puser as string,
		ptenant as string,
		pAdditionalInfo as string,
		datarow as string,
		userrow as string,
		pagerow as string,
		rowinformation as (errorInformation as string, userReturnedNoData as boolean, isUserSummaryRow as boolean, userHasCompleteData as boolean)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Messages
source(output(
		aboutMe as string,
		birthday as string,
		hireDate as string,
		interests as string[],
		mySite as string,
		pastProjects as string[],
		preferredName as string,
		responsibilities as string[],
		schools as string[],
		skills as string[],
		accountEnabled as boolean,
		ageGroup as string,
		businessPhones as string[],
		city as string,
		companyName as string,
		consentProvidedForMinor as string,
		country as string,
		createdDateTime as string,
		department as string,
		displayName as string,
		givenName as string,
		id as string,
		imAddresses as string[],
		jobTitle as string,
		legalAgeGroupClassification as string,
		mail as string,
		mailNickname as string,
		mobilePhone as string,
		officeLocation as string,
		onPremisesImmutableId as string,
		onPremisesLastSyncDateTime as string,
		onPremisesSecurityIdentifier as string,
		onPremisesSyncEnabled as string,
		passwordPolicies as string,
		postalCode as string,
		preferredLanguage as string,
		proxyAddresses as string[],
		state as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		surname as string,
		usageLocation as string,
		userPrincipalName as string,
		userType as string,
		assignedLicenses as (disabledPlans as string[], skuId as string)[],
		assignedPlans as (assignedDateTime as string, capabilityStatus as string, service as string, servicePlanId as string)[],
		provisionedPlans as (capabilityStatus as string, provisioningStatus as string, service as string)[],
		puser as string,
		ptenant as string,
		pAdditionalInfo as string,
		datarow as string,
		userrow as string,
		pagerow as string,
		rowinformation as (errorInformation as string, userReturnedNoData as boolean, isUserSummaryRow as boolean, userHasCompleteData as boolean)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Users
Messages, Users join(Messages@puser == Users@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
